content: What popular board game involves buying and trading properties, and has versions based on cities around the world?

The popular board game you're referring to is Monopoly. It involves players rolling dice to move around the game board, buying and trading properties, and developing their properties with houses and hotels to rent to opponents to drive them into bankruptcy. Monopoly has indeed been adapted into various international versions, often based on cities around the world, allowing players to experience the game with locally familiar property names and currencies.
